articles.title: NASA Taps Axiom Space for First Artemis Moonwalking Spacesuits - NASA
articles.description: NASA has selected Axiom Space to deliver a moonwalking system for the Artemis III mission, which will land Americans on the surface of the Moon for the first time in over 50 years. This award – the first one under a competitive spacesuits contract – is for a …

articles.author: Melissa Alonso and Devon M. Sayers, CNN
articles.title: Two sisters who survived the Holocaust died in Alabama 11 days apart - CNN
articles.description: Two sisters who survived the Holocaust, and fulfilled their fathers dream to make it to America, died days apart from each other in Alabama, according to the Alabama Holocaust Education Center.

articles.title: Zimbabwe: Africa’s oldest dinosaur might have been… American - The Africa Report
articles.description: Scientists have just announced the discovery of the skeleton of the oldest dinosaur in Africa, in the Zimbabwean district of Mbire. The remains seem to confirm the theory of continental drift.
